name: Virconstein 3D
description:
A tech demo of a raycasted FPS game for the Vircon32 virtual console.

Consists of a single level that you can free roam.

Use the directional pad to move forward/backward and look right/left, keep the B button pressed to strafe.

Source code can be downloaded from GitHub.

Textures by Little Martian - Retro Texture Pack.
